about.title: About

about.52PD: Special thanks for his continuous effort in maintaining templates.
about.linchen1965: Special thanks for his continuous effort in maintaining templates.
about.githubContent: Face any problems? Search or raise an issue here!

details.title: Details
details.import: You may directly use this template if your are in Rail Map Painter or Rail Map Toolkit

donation.title: Early Bird Donation
donation.content1: Thank you for considering making a donation to Rail Map Toolkit. Your support will enable us to continue updating and enhancing this outstanding project.
donation.content2: By donating, you will also be able to upload your works which can then be showcased in this gallery, and shared via an auto-generated random link. e.g.
donation.content3: We encourage you to open a Github issue today to secure your personalized link privilege as an early bird bonus before donations become available. Please note that the personalized link will cost more once donations are open.
donation.content4: Thank you again for supporting the Rail Map Toolkit. You may find terms and conditions below as well as how to donate using various methods (coming soon).
donation.terms1: Donations are non-refundable under any circumstances.
donation.terms2: Any payment should be for donation purposes only, and does not constitute a contract for the purchase of any products or services.
donation.terms3: Additionally, we will add users who have donated to a whitelist that can update the gallery.
donation.terms4: After donation and uploading the work, it will be published immediately and can be accessed no later than 24 hours afterwards.
donation.terms5: Early bird donation does not involve any transactions. We plan to launch the donation function this year and merge all uploaded works.
donation.terms6: After the donation function is launched, you have 60 days to donate and upload data, and we will reply to you in Github's issue tracker. Failure to donate and upload data in a timely manner will result in the loss of eligibility to use personalized links.
donation.terms7: Personalized links may be taken based on the order of donations, in case of conflicts.
donation.terms8: All provided data will be publicly available on the internet for anyone to browse.
donation.terms9: Links will be valid within 365 days of being added to the gallery. Donating again and re-requesting before the link expires will extend its validity until you no longer donate or re-request. After it expires, the previously obtained link may be revoked and allocated to other works.
donation.terms10: Uploaded works must not contain any political bias, pornography, violence or infringement of intellectual property rights. Inappropriate works and links will be blocked and removed.
donation.terms11: We believe in a free and open internet. If you have a Uniform Resource Locator address that can be accessed by global users, you can share your work using a link with extra parameters. This feature will be launched after the donation function is open, at the latest within 180 days after opening.
donation.terms12: We have the right to interpret the terms and conditions. We reserve the right to modify, add, or remove these terms without further notice.
donation.methodCN: Donate in CNY via Alipay or Wechat Pay
donation.methodUS: Donate in USD via Paypal or Visa card
